Extraordinary Trainers is a health and wellness network organization made up of fitness and medical professionals in Las Vegas dedicated to providing top quality care to the community.
Our team includes Personal Trainers, Chiropractors, Physical Therapists, Massage Therapists, Registered Dietitians, and Health Coaches.
Utilizing a team approach, we are able to ensure that our clients get the treatment they deserve while every professionals remains in their scope of practice.
